website_summaries.verdict: A well-made bag that is great for anyone on-the-go. Available in a variety of colors to match anyone's ski gear.
pros: Owners rave about the space of the bag and how lightweight it is
You can load up more than just boots if you'd like
Plus, it's seriously water-resistant in case you get stuck in a snow storm
cons: Multiple complaints that the top handle has pulled off from the bag

customer_reviews.title: Handle strap separated from bag.
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Top handle strap broke away from bag during 2nd use. Bag contained 1 pair of boots, ski pants, helmet, goggles, hat, gloves and face warmer. Handle straps are sewn into top seam of bag with no reinforcing stitches. Strap ends are not finished (hot melt) before stitching and they fray. A single stitch is used to sew the top seam and strap end together. No strength for long term durability.
customer_reviews.author: 007rkb

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my son for Xmas...before his first ski trip the handle literally split from the bag. So disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: This bag is huge!
customer_reviews.text: Each side of the bag holds a boot compartment with drain grommets on the bottom, which leaves the center of the bag open for everything else. I uploaded a picture of the bag with an adult ski boot (men's 29.5) inside the boot pocket on the side. The center compartment is big enough to fit adult men's ski pants, men's large ski jacket, a hat, gloves and a neck warmer plus extra gloves and a few odds and ends with a little room to spare. This bag is really all you need for you boots and everything else. It's huge and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: This bag works great for ski boots and everything else in the main ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: The first trip I took with this bag, it ripped right along the zipper. The bag was not overloaded, yet merely seemed to be poorly stitched. The warranty does NOT cover tears like these, even though It was my first time using the bag. DO NOT BUY. This bag works great for ski boots and everything else in the main compartment. I easily fit helmet, gloves, goggles and all my layers in the main, and has a zipper on top for extra items. Side boot area also has drains for snow/water run off. Bag seems very durable and the backpack straps make it a breeze when transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot (plus plus) Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from my spring ski trip! Checked this bag both ways and it held up perfectly! (Delta) It's big.... and for fun, I tallied up everything I just pulled out! Ski boots TWO helmets (I bought a new one but didn't want to toss my old one!) Big toiletry bag! Makeup bag Flip flops (for changing in the lobby) Goggles + 2 extra lenses Sunglasses case Hand warmers (didn't need!) 3 stocking hats 2 pair gloves Ski pants 2 pair base layer leggings Base layer top 5 neck warmers (just in case!) Fanny pack A few other accessories (including a trail map!) Love all the pockets. The ONLY disadvantage is that it's heavy when fully loaded!!
customer_reviews.author: WINTERS7079

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - broken handle
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the Athalon Everything Bag before and bought this one for my daughter for Christmas (the size is GREAT). She has used it twice on ski trips and the top handle came unstiched from the bag so the handle is now useless. It's too bad as I would have purchased more of these bags but the quality must be poor and wonder if other stiching will come apart and my daughter now doesnt like the bag becuase it is "broken" :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S Zenner

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot and Gear Bag
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great option for carrying your boots and gear. it's roomy enough for size 12 boots, helmet, goggles, jacket, pants, long underwear, 2 pairs of gloves and more. it's ideal for day/weekend trips via the car and occassional plane trips. if you're a heavy destination traveler via plane, i might look at different options from transpack since they have wider straps and beefier handles which will withstand checked bagging better. i have both packs and prefer the athlon for local trips. it has better back padding and is more comfortable in general. Transpack is more rugged and optimum for plane travel but much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: MacDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time an it’s just like it looks in the picture. I bought this for my tween daughter to use when she goes skiing. It is great quality. It’s large, especially for her age, and I bought a adult size bag so she could use it when she was older. It has so much room, enough to fit her junior size ski boots, size small helmet, and still have a lot of room left over. There are several small pockets to organize stuff, which I really appreciate. She loves this bag and is so excited to use it for this ski season and many ski seasons to come. Overall amazing purchase, would buy again for my older daughter.
customer_reviews.author: W. Qin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Very good looking, well made & holds a ton. Bigger than all our others.
customer_reviews.author: playday05

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made - very disappointed I have to replace so soon!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag 1/7/18 and less than two seasons later (about 12 uses or so) it is useless. Today (11/20/19) the handle broke, just like it has for so many others - so I guess we're lucky it lasted for a few uses first? But right away (March 2018) the main zipper broke, and we were inconvenienced and annoyed but managed to work around it by only using the zipper from the other side. This bag is very poorly made, as the many reports of broken handles, I only wish I'd seen these reports before buying it, so I could have spent less (Amazon Basics) or stuck with Transpack or another more durable bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sailing away

customer_reviews.title: Great ski boot backpack
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around at local ski shops for the right bag before deciding on this one. After Also reading reviews And talking to a few friends I ordered this bag and was not disappointed. The quality is great, nice sturdy zippers, and other high quality materials went into the production of this bag. I have already loaded it up and it fits all my gear with room to spare. This includes pants, jacket, mittens, goggles, helmet, and some other misc items. I plan to purchase more for my husband and children.
customer_reviews.author: GGsmomma

customer_reviews.title: I have had 2 failures with this bag with no ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 failures with this bag with no response from the company regarding warranty service. First one of the shoulder straps rip out and had it repaired by a shoemaker. This weekend the top carry handle ripped out and I expect that I will again have no response regarding warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: V Piccotti

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this boot bag! It’s roomy with lots of space for you helmet, boots, gloves, goggles, etc. I sent this as checked baggage on United with all of my gear and itcame back great after the abuse of being tossed around. It’s padded with lots of pockets. The design pattern is awesome, too! I bought the matching ski bag and it performed just as excellent as the boot bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppapolooza

customer_reviews.title: The bag is excellent. Everything you would want in a boot bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is excellent. Everything you would want in a boot bag. The customer service is not so much. After owning this for less than a year, the zippers on the main compartment broke (I can only assume it's made in China). I called and emailed Athalon and have gotten no response. I've since bought a new boot bag from another manufacturer. If you're going to sell products that have quality control problems, you should build in a line item for returns and put more of your resources into customer service. Anyway, buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Mayes

customer_reviews.title: LARGE - able to really fit boots, baselayer, pants AND helmet into bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two different bags for my kids - my son wanted an rust/orange on and this bag fit the bill. I have to say that compared to another brand of boot bag that shall remain nameless (starts and ends with a T) this is a GREAT bag. Plenty big and the handles are reinforced. I can see my son being able to carry a days plus worth of gear and his helmet in the pocket of this bag. I was very surprised how much could be put into this bag. Time will tell if it holds up but all indications are that this will serve him well for years to come. I am ordering one for myself today.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag, fits a lot of stuff and didn’t break
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this bag! Flew with it, checked it, flew back, and no straps broke. It’s honestly a blessing to have when walking to and from the car. It fit: boots, helmet, jacket, pants, inner layers, goggles, gloves and would fit maybe one more piece of clothing and a few random small things in the extra pockets. You won’t have to worry about having enough space with these. Overall very happy!! I would recommend. I was scared of those other $20 bags that all reviews said would break immediately so I decided to pay double or triple the price for that peace of mind. Hopefully the ROI will be pretty good on this purchase. Will update if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to be good overall but I returned
customer_reviews.text: It does not stand up well enough on its own to make it easy to load and unload. You have to hold it up/open to do anything. Once you've got some stuff inside it then makes it annoying to put the boots in and out. Since the bag doesnt really hold its own structure, more contents make it distort and then pockets and zipper become misshapen and harder to use. I went with a Kulkea which costs more but is a lot nicer, tougher, sturdier, and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: IIBuc_NastyII

customer_reviews.title: Straps broke on 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 bags for middle school ski club trips. About 1/2 full (used to carry goggles, boots and lunch) - 10 mins btwn parking lot and slopes and 5 minutes from house to driveway on 3 trips. Will try to get replacement bag of same type and update review. Pros: Graffiti print very stylish; easy to find in a ski club of 400+ kids with mainly all black baqs.
customer_reviews.author: orchid lady

customer_reviews.title: Even better looking in person!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and I LOVE this bag. It does have so many compartments that sometimes I forget where everything is, but after a while of keeping things in the same places, it's getting easier. It's got extra room too so I can put almost all my ski gear in it in our ski lease to keep it all out of the way. We bought one for my daughter who is a tall 8 year old and it's pretty big for her, but she loves it too. It's great that it has that handle on the back so I can help her carry it from behind especially at the end of a long tiring ski day!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: These bags are awesome!  I have 3.
customer_reviews.text: My sons and I ski & snowboard. Getting a 12 & 15 year old and their gear to the slopes is tough enough. Nevermind having everything organized. I love these bags. I have everything they need for a ski trip stored in their bag: Boots, helmet, goggles, two pairs of mittens/gloves; snow pants:, ski jacket; gators, etc. There's still room for more! It takes the stress off of packing to go up north (from Boston area). The backpack style is so convenient because they still have their hands free to carry skis or snowboard. I'm so glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Stores my entire ski outfit
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, big bag, seems sturdy with good zippers. I can fit two ski boots, a helmet, headphones, two pairs of goggles, underlayers, two pairs of gloves, two pairs of socks, a couple hand and foot warmers, a snack bar, a jacket, and ski pants. Now that takes a little tetris action: socks in boots, gloves in outside pockets, goggles inside helmet, but it can literally hold all of my ski gear for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: seems durable, boot compartment not wide enough for size 9 women's snowboard boot. Side accessory pockets very hard to get in to when boots are loaded in the bag. Center storage area is average size, not as large as I'd like, and shrinks when the boots are loaded since the boot compartment itself is so narrow. I think I like my volkl bag better (but it was stolen from the lodge). I am glad this comes in so many colors as i never want a plain black bag again - - it was very hard searching the lodge when 99% of boot bags are black!!
customer_reviews.author: nancykind

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag!! Fits practically all my gear. Holds my boots in the dedicated spots. In the main compartment, I keep 3 pairs of gloves, my suspenders, helmet and googles, my snow pants and my ski jacket. Zippers always function as they should. There are also pockets to store smaller gear on the sides of each boot compartment and on the top flap, which is where I store my clava and frost shield
customer_reviews.author: Skibikeplease

customer_reviews.title: THE bag to buy
customer_reviews.text: 1st season using mine just ended. Excellent bag. Durable. Comfortable on your back, even when it's loaded up with boots, helmet, ski pants, snacks, etc. Ample room in the main compartment and in various pockets to carry everything I can imagine wanting to bring. Biggest "complaint" = It seems like 9/10 other skiers at the mountain we frequent own this bag, too, so we've tried to make sure to use eye-catching ID tags on ours!
customer_reviews.author: RF456

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Used for 20 ski days, and it’s been extremely breathable. Has made trips to and from the mountain a breeze. Very durable. Can fit a pair of boots, two sets of ski pants, two jackets, two helmets. The smaller compartments are perfect for smaller packed items and the waterproof pockets are great for valuables. I couldn’t recommend a ski bag more
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this bag when we received it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this bag when we received it. Great pockets, strong zippers and nicely assembled. We have had the bag since Christmas 2017. After 3 uses by my 11 yo son, the plastic backpack strap adjuster is already broken. I'm disappointed, but have been able to improvise. I would have rated it higher, had this piece not already given out.
customer_reviews.author: E. Conley

customer_reviews.title: Bags hold up to luggage handling and carry everything you need
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product more stars I would. Luggage handlers simply can't destroy it. Three hops each way across the country, two of these and two of Athalon's padded ski bags arrived in perfect condition. More importantly all of our gear arrived untouched. This bag is so well designed that had I been more frugal in packing I likely could have avoided checking a second bag for clothing and other stuff. The center compartment is spacious and well protected. The tuck-in backpack straps make hauling these bags around the lodge a no-nevermind. I highly recommend this for its quality and excellence in design.
customer_reviews.author: Someone Somewhere

customer_reviews.title: Great ski boot bag for adults - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and well made ski boot bag! I paid twice as much for an almost identical Marker bag. I fit my boots in the side pockets and all my ski gear in the main pocket, with several smaller pockets for my glove & accessories. Very well constructed. Boot pockets are brethable with grommet holes for wet boots that keep them leaking into main pocket where ski clothes are kept. Has backpack handles that zip away to avoid damage when flying. Great ski boot bag for adults - highly recommend. Comparable to $75-125 bags.
customer_reviews.author: StoliR

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for less than a year and used it twice, the strap is hanging by a thread.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie Wasniewski

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality; HUGE! It WILL fit in airline overheads :-)
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Should've gotten years sooner. I planned to take aboard aircraft as carry-on (it WILL fit in most U.S. airline overheads, though you may need to lay on side), but ended up checking instead (I'm an airline pilot so it's free either way) due to convenience. This bag is really all you need for a solo weekend skiing trip, though it'll easily fit one pair of boots, two helmets, two goggles, two pairs of gloves, two sets of skiing accessories...if you're traveling with spouse/buddy. Yes, you could fit two pairs of boots, though you wouldn't have room for helmets, etc. Wonderful bag.
customer_reviews.author: munkeePilot

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be without it now!
customer_reviews.text: OMG so love this bag. The colour is beautiful. It's really functional and reasonably lightweight. So many zips and pockets inside and out. Very comfortable and evenly weighted when on my back. Very comfortable straps. Highly recommend to others. Don't know how I coped before without it! My partner bought one too and he feels exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit big for my 7 and 10 year old but they are sturdy. I anticipate these bags will last them through ...
customer_reviews.text: My ski trips are much easier now! I got one for myself and each of my kids. The weight is distributed between all of us. It's a bit big for my 7 and 10 year old but they are sturdy. I anticipate these bags will last them through their teenage years. Very roomy, even when the boots are in, I have plenty of room for my helmet and lots more. Snacks and what not all fit. Very comfortable to wear on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Kitteny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ski Bag!
customer_reviews.text: These boot bags are perfect! I ordered the lumberjack print for myself and the black and grey camo for my boyfriend. These bags fit everything we need in them. Our boots (drainage system is great!), our helmets, goggles, gloves, snow pants, extra jacket, water bottle and snacks. Once we are geared up we put all of our regular stuff inside them and they show away great. Just grab from your cubby and go! I recommend these to all of my friends and get compliments on the bags all the time. Worth the price and they’ve held up very nicely. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Its a bag. its not sexy, but its a very good bag
customer_reviews.text: well built thick material that seems like it'll last. plenty of room for everything you'd need for a day of skiing ( hence, the name) I can fit boots, helmet goggles, gloves base layers and snow pants as well as any other little items I may need like hand warmers sharpener etc... I
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag easily fits my ski boots, helmet, gloves and extra clothing. The size and layout of the bag are exactly what I was looking for. A big con, however, is that there is a very strong chemical smell to the bag which hasn't gone away even after months of letting it air out. I'm afraid at this point that it won't go away. I would give it 4 starts except for the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have to say this bag is WAAAAYYYY better! And with Prime I got it in two ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous bag especially for the price! I saw a similar bag in a ski shop close to my home that was $99! I have to say this bag is WAAAAYYYY better! And with Prime I got it in two days, which was perfect for my upcoming ski trip to Colorado. This bag has a great color, which means you won't mistake it for the countless other "black" ski bags out there. Plus so many pockets for stashing lots of stuff. It holds boots, helmet, gloves, pants, socks, protein bars, key clips... I can't say enough good things about this bag. It is also made really well, which means you can take it on many a ski trip. Thank you, Athalon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Shoup

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but they just need to beef up the inside material to get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: This bag will fit everything my wife needs. I bought the High Sierra Pro DLX bag a couple years ago but they no longer sell that exact same bag hence the reason I bought this one. The high sierra was about $10 more but was much higher quality on the inside fabric. Not that this is bad fabric but I think they could put something more substantial in there. My wife love the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, nice quality - LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase, this bag is high quality and very convenient! Makes carrying your boots SO much easier, and also fits your helmet and other ski gear. The back pack is clutch, so you are hands free. Definitely worth the investment!! I also purchased a Athletico bag for my husband, and I think this one is a bit better quality, but both are nice and convenient!
customer_reviews.author: MichLip

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Boot Bag
customer_reviews.text: This boot bag seems sturdy, has zippered side and front pockets, and adjustable back straps. I did return it however because it was heavy which doesn't matter to everyone but I didn't want to lug around extra weight over the weight of my ski boots. Also I could not justify the price skiing only a few days a year. It would be a good choice if you're planning to take with you on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Sogoli

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BAG!!
customer_reviews.text: When something is this good I have to write a review. This is one of the few times I have been blown away by the quality of a product, specially at this price. Its extremely well constructed, good sturdy zippers, thick walls, room for two pairs of boots plus gear, its HUGE!. Its my third boot bag and doesn't even compare to the rest. If you are reading this, just buy it. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin Langensch Camargo

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag - Lots of Storage Space
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bag. Easy to get stuff in and out of the bag, and plenty of room for the boots. Other bags I've had haven't been big enough or they've been too big. At 5'2, I found this one to be perfect for my height and needs without feeling like it was too large for my frame or not big enough for all my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Conn

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 kids who all love to ski. They each needed a bag to store their gear. I bought one of these years ago. We tried a couple other brands and sent them all back. This is the ONLY ski bag we will use. Its big!! They can hold all of their gear. I really like the inside zipper pocket for them store their food money and anything else small so it doesn't get lost. I can't say enough about the great quality of this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Sterling

customer_reviews.title: This bag is roomy and fits everything well but the ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is roomy and fits everything well but the handle on the top of the bag ripped off the very first time I picked it up. I now missed the return window so make sure you pack it and test it when you get it rather than waiting for your first ski trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this boot bag!
customer_reviews.text: My husband gave me the purple and gray one for Christmas last year, I have used this bag so much and love having a place for all my ski gear. It was great last season to have a “go bag” all ready with everything packed for a ski weekend if the weather called for snow. Fits my helmet, goggles, pants, base layers, gloves, you name it. Also love having a place to store gear in the off season. This will be our second purchase of this boot bag
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fit all my stuff! Helmet, ski pants, under cloths, gloves, ski boots, goggles! It’s all in there with room to spear! But it gets heavy fast. I wouldn’t wear it for long, I’d check it on a plane. And thanks to those handy dandy straps that hide away it will check really easy!
customer_reviews.author: N. D. Fellows

customer_reviews.title: Great boot-and-everything bag
customer_reviews.text: After 30+ years of skiing, finally bought this bag to carry everything I need to the lodge. High quality zippers, rugged materials. Skip the overpriced branded bags--those are for posers. I do wish, though, that they would design something for a name tag--due to their popularity, you may see a lot of these bags with same colors at the lodge.
customer_reviews.author: Yoon S. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 29.5 boots easily (size 13 shoe). Helmet, gloves, top, socks and snow pants also fit with in. It's comfortable against my back for walking. The straps can be slipped inside the pack in case you are checking this bag with the airline, which the Transpack can't do. Note, skis and a boot bag count as one bag in terms of the airlines charging you). I couldn't fit this fully loaded in the overhead compartment, but took the boots out and then it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Soare

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, durable, plenty of storage for boots, helmet and gloves/skull cap socks hand warmers. Shoulder straps for carrying like a backpack or over the shoulder. A little bungee set up on top just to keep something small for quick access...the boots fit in the outer compartments leaving the center for everything else.. Put a couple of face towels at the bottom of the boot chambers to catch the boot water and crud.. allows for easier cleaning..
customer_reviews.author: Rudynewtech

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable, holds everything I could ever need to take to the mountains, and it looks good! Everything feels sturdy, zippers are rugged and have had no stretching of the seams at the shoulder straps. Plenty of pockets, and it cleaned up real nice after the season. So glad I finally got a real boot bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nordic Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable :(
customer_reviews.text: The bag holds a good amount, but durability is a problem. I just used it for the first time today and have only had it in the trunk of my car and the overhead bin and the edges on the piping are already damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Bay

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Ski Bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously so in love with this bag. I have always used a duffel bag but at the end of the day it was so heavy on my shoulders and really bulky. I have finally upgraded to this bag this year and I couldn't be happier! I feel like a turtle walking around with it on my back but it fits everything I would ever need! Both ski boots on either side, my ski jacket, ski pants, helmet, gloves, and there is still room if I need anything else. It has so many extra pockets in addition to the boot pockets on the sides as well as inside. If you're a skier or rider this is a perfect bag for you!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag - has plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag - has plenty of space, very comfortable to carry on the back. Love it! Especially like that the backpack straps unclip and go into a zippered pocket. Whenever I use this bag, the airlines never question me because it is a legit boot bag. Strictly speaking, you are only suppose to but boots in it, but there is plenty of room for a helmet and snowpants. Even has nifty pockets on the side near the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Geppert

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose bag
customer_reviews.text: WE decided to use this bag for our climbing gear during our last trip and omg it can hold a lot!!! We had 4 harness, 4 climbing shoes, 4 helmets and few other climbing gear and there was still room for more. Definitely can’t wait to use it during the winter season
customer_reviews.author: Lin T

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to access your ski supplies,
customer_reviews.text: This bag is easy to use and find your ski supplies in! The middle section easily holds my helmet and all ski clothes/accessories. I can just put my bag in the back of my suv, and it keeps all that I need handy for the next ski opportunity. Air travel was relatively easy. When I had to carry it for a distance the backpack straps worked great! The only slightly negative comment would be that it is awkward to carry by the handles when not using as a backpack. I did not try to use it as carry on luggage, so am not sure if it meets the airline requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Fits Everything!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my snowboard boots, helmet, gloves, helmet liner, lunch, several beverages, and yesterday, a change of clothing for apres activities...with plenty of room to spare. Also, several smaller compartments for phone, money, chargers, etc. Keeps me much more organized and able to find everything throughout the course of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Babiarz

customer_reviews.title: Quality, function and value. A really great bag.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the smaller version for all my kids and was impressed. I bought this one for myself and am glad I did. There is more than enough room for all my gear, some extra stuff just in case, radios, snacks etc.. It suits my needs and the needs of my family on ski trips in every way. I just bought another one for my oldest who outgrew the kids version. I cant imagine a more perfect ski bag for my purposes. The perfect balance of quality, function and price.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 for my family. The bag is substantial and holds a lot. It looks expensive, the fabric is nice. The zippers are sturdy. It’s on the large side but my family says that’s a plus. The pockets are great for warmers, phone, gloves, snacks.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag
customer_reviews.text: After years of using a duffle bag, I treated myself to a boot bag. This bag is very sturdy and holds everything. You can fit your boots, helmet, googles, gloves and a few other items in the main bag. There are compartments on both sides too. It was a good price too compared to the ski shops. This bag will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette K

customer_reviews.title: Huge Bag, Great Design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8-year old because I was tried of lugging his ski stuff around. I was actually sort of hoping that he would decide that he wanted something different so that I could steal this bag from him! I love the graffiti design. The straps are well designed and fit comfortably. Others have commented on the amazing amount of space. I think this is a bit large for a younger child, but my son doesn't seem too mind. Guess I'll have to buy another one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for skiing
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these. One for me and one for each of my sons. Helmet, gloves, mittens, ski pants, ski jacket, boots, goggles, gators, etc. all fit and there is room for more. So helpful and convenient. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Organization!!’
customer_reviews.text: The bag has the perfect space for everything. Love being able to keep all of my ski stuff in one place, helps for organization and making sure you have everything. The bag performed well at the airport as well, used both as a carry-on and checked baggage. No problems at all with the bag. Will be buying two more for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! You really can put a lot in it!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for holding my boots, helmet, goggles, 2 sets of gloves, neck warmer, ski pants, change of socks, wallet, cash, keys, water bottle and small lunch bag. It all fits!! Got a 4 star for travel because with all that stuff in it, it's heavy 🤣🤣 Appears well made so I suspect it will be durable and last. I like the option of handle or backpack straps.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for travel. Even with both boots in the bag I had plenty of room for goggles, gloves, hat, jacket, and more. The hide-away backpack straps come in really handy when walking through the airport and I love the fact that most airlines will let you check in the boot bag and ski bag as one item. I’ve owned other boot bags and this one is by far the best quality for the price. I’ve recommended it to other people and they love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisL

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough!
customer_reviews.text: The top handle broke after 1 use and the boots inside were children's boots! I had to return this product
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boot Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is well made and has lots of room. Comfortable back pack. The boots fit straight in (versus the slant fit in a transpak) so my new helmet with the built in goggles fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and you will know you would love to return the item
customer_reviews.text: Everything well made but not the inside. Everything inside is like cheap fake chinese stuff. Amazon sent me a damaged item instead of a very good condition used item. Doesn’t worth your money. The shoes will stain all of other stuffs you have inside the bag. Not even as good as your high school backpack. I recommend walmart “thank you” bag instead.
customer_reviews.author: my thuan

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed. Bag seemed good, but the backpack straps were sewn in backwards on one side. No way to fix it myself. Will update review when I get my other one. I have a trip in a couple days and I don't like having to return something when I am trying to prep for the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not survive the very first use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my son for use on our Colorado ski vacation in March. On the very first use when my son went to lift the bag by the main handle one side of the strap tore free from the bag. Unfortunately, it has been over three months since purchase, so I don't think return is possible, but I will give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: mcoomers

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice now. The backpack straps tuck away if you don’t want them dragging but it is so convenient to wear this as a pack to free up your hands. My last boot bag was 30 years old and never quite large enough to hold a pair of size 27.5 boots and helmets weren’t common then. This is a great bag and I’m looking forward to years of service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag but be warned that it is BIG. Definitely enough for an adult. I bought it for my grade school child, for ski club. It's a little clunky for him to carry around but it fits all of his gear, snow pants, lunch box, and extra clothes perfectly and organized. There is still room to space. I considered a junior size bag but overheard a ski store clerk tell a customer they are not much cheaper and they don't really hold everything a child brings with them for ski club.
customer_reviews.author: MeiLani

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Backpack smells like it sat in chemicals for days before being shipped. I put a couple of drier sheets in the bag and it still stinks two days later. The bag itself seems to be of good quality but the smell is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo428

customer_reviews.title: Bag hold much stuff
customer_reviews.text: My daughter goes out to our local hill 4 days/week. This bag will comfortably carry her boots, GS suit, pants, soft shell jacket, boot batteries, mittens, lunch/snacks, extra jacket, water bottle, helmet, socks, car key, cell phone cable/charger and have room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Roomy boot bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love the room in the bag. It's replacing my Transpack that failed with a broken strap and the company refused to honor the warranty, so I used my speedy stitcher to repair it. Not pretty. This Athalon bag has much more room, but doesn't seem to be much larger in size. Don't know how they did it, but I can pack my ski pants in it which I could not do with the Transpack. Lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: penobscotriver

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag. Too small for large boots and helmets.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the boots fine. I have size 11. My only challenge is that the helmet won’t fit inside the center storage with the boots. I have to strap the helmet outside. Overall design is fine, I just needed to order the next bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The size of this bag is just perfect, able to fit everything needed for a day on the slopes. I was amazed at the quality of the bag when I first opened it but was a bit disappointed that the sewing around the zipper let go the first time we used it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Castonguay

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HUGE bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect storage for boots and gear! Its huge and you can hold a LOT of stuff in this bag. I bought 2 of these, one for my husband and one for me. We were able to get a jacket, ski pants, gloves, & helmet, and there was still room for more! LOVE the seperate boot compartment so when your boots are wet everything else stays dry. Really like the back pack straps too makes it very easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Chantay Foley

customer_reviews.title: Great value and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag. Fits boots, helmet and clothes. Plenty of room. Survived round trip airline flight no problem. Use it for day trips as well. Very pleased with the bag; it makes lugging boots, etc. much easier, and everything stays organized. Good quality. I would buy it again (I also bought one for my wife and she thinks it’s the greatest). Plenty of padding and zipper access and compartments. Very well designed and constructed. I considered the transpac bag, but I think this one has a bit more room.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I purchased one for myself and one for my boyfriend, and we both love the convenience of it! The bag holds my ski boots in the outside pockets and then I am free to stuff my helmet, snowpants, and whatever else I need in the large main pocket. I used this for 3 ski trips this past season and did not have any issues with the straps breaking (like mentioned in other reviews).
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: This bag is HUGE. Fit my boots, helmet, gloves, snow pants, helmet liner, gloves, change of clothes and hand warmers inside. A but bulky to wield, but it distributed weight well and is easy to put on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Top Handle rips off after 3rd trip
customer_reviews.text: YOU'VE BEEN WARNED.......If you buy this bag you should expect the top handle to rip off right after the return date. I suggest you find a different bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a ski trip including flights
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag just before going on a ski trip that included both flights and drives. It worked well as checked luggage, holding boots, helmet, and lots of ski clothing; it also worked well during the trip to hold everything I needed for the day (except of course for skis and poles). It's great that it has backpack straps that can easily be zipped away for the flight. The bag offers a surprising large amount of storage space. The bag appears to be quite durable, but I've only used it for one trip so I don't have enough history with it to say for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Stromberg & Harvey Alcabes

customer_reviews.title: Handle Broke after only 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag on Jan 14th 2019 for all the positive reasons others have already listed. Was extremely happy with the bag until last night, after having used it only five times when I went to lift the bag up by the handle on one side of the handle completely pulled out and separated. Only had a pair of boots, helmet, goggles and gloves in the bag which is what the bag is made for. Very disappointed that a bag that has so many great qualities has such a "weak-link".
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Extreme value
customer_reviews.text: There are fancier bags and there are more costly bags. I don't think any of them work any better than this bag. Sure, it looks a little pedestrian, but who cares? This thing is supposed to carry my boots, helmet, gloves, etc. and it does just that with easy. It has plenty of room, is comfortable when wearing, and is made with quality materials. The only knock I have, and it is minor, is that that straps are shapes suck that once you put one on, it is kind of hard to reach the other. This ergonomic shape also makes it feel better while wearing, so I can't really complain too much. I can't see getting any other boot bag.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We love Athalon products, and have used their duffels for years. Accordingly, we were excited to find out they made a Boot Bag. The quality of the bag is great, but we hope for 2 improvements. First, add more pockets - particularly a laptop sleeve. If I'm going to carry on the boot bag then I need to eliminate the backpack I would normally carry. Second, provide a blue color that matches the blue duffel I already own.
customer_reviews.author: GaryD

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It - Needs a way to hold a helmet top/outside.
customer_reviews.text: After taking a few years off to start our family, my wife and I are back on the slopes and teaching our kids to ski. With not only our own gear, but also the stuff the kids can't carry themselves, good bags make all the difference! The quality is top notch, and I got great points for the color and pattern choice. The ONLY reason for not giving 5-starts... I would have liked some kind of mesh or net on top of the bag to hold a helmet. Placing the helmet inside the bag with the boots (and the socks, and the gloves, and the goggles, and... and... and...) just seems like a bad idea.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Best Ski Bag ever.
customer_reviews.text: I am rounding the corner toward 60 and struggled with ski boots over the shoulder (swinging into my car as I tried to pick up all my other gear). I can put everything (boots, clothing, helmet, goggles and food) but the skis/poles in here, get it on my back from the tailgate of my SUV and walk from the parking lot without any trouble (fibromyalgia!) This bag has a pocket for everything- so glad I found it when my mom wanted an idea for my birthday present. Amazing value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon woman

customer_reviews.title: Straps broke
customer_reviews.text: The bag lasted 1 1/2 months The straps broke on my fist ski trip out west before I even got to the car. The only thing in the bag was my helmet,gloves and ski boots a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: martycoar

customer_reviews.title: Great bag - color is off
customer_reviews.text: This Athalon bag is fantastic. My family owns a couple of them because they are so great. The most recent one we ordered is the gray and bright green. I expected the green to be very bright - spring green or neon green, based upon the picture on amazon. The color is much more muted than the picture - both the gray & green are darker than portrayed. Still great, and we aren't returning it, and still giving it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice ski bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 9-year-old daughter's ski things. It holds her boots, helmet, goggles, hats, gloves, etc. and her ski clothes - snow pants and jacket, and there is still room for more. It is a bit big for her, but she can still carry it pretty comfortably. When emptied, it fits in the larger-sized lockers at the ski hills. It is a nice, durable bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly S

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality bags. Shoulder strap broke first day (bag 1), handle broke second day (bag 2)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these bags for ski race gear. The straps are poorly constructed and just pull out of the stitching. Possibly the ends were not treated to prevent fraying. The rest of the bag seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great! I almost bought the other brand because that ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I almost bought the other brand because that was what everyone was using and liked it but, I had to buy 2 so I could not afford the other brand! Which I am glad I didn't! This bag is prefect and it hold everything! My boys are 7 & 8 and they can carry this with everything in it plus their skis! Its great to keep everything stored away when not in use and not have to run around to find things when it is time to go skiing! I like that I can carry it as a backpack or a regular bag!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Orsini

customer_reviews.title: Zippers stick and they are very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had for a couple of weeks so tough to rate off the bat. But they are very roomy and fit lots of things. I do find them extremely heavy even as a back pack, my older bags were much lighter. The zippers are not that great. I bought two and one is having issues and sticking. So I will update after using for a while. Right now not happy with the zippers on one is the biggest problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Goose

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, roomy, but almost too big for air travel
customer_reviews.text: well built but actually almost too tall for air travel. But great for car and bus travel since plenty of room to stuff other things. Since airlines say you cannot put clothes in the bag, it is only about half full with the boots and my helmet, goggles. I've been stuffing gloves, other items in it so things don't slosh around and so far haven't had an issue with checking them. So I wish it was a bit shorter. Width is great since doesn't squish my helmet as another Athalon hard sided bag I have does.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea - lots of storage space - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a ripped top handle. Another bag of the same manufacturer had zipper separated. Poor quality - stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Anatoli Arkhipenko

customer_reviews.title: so good. I've had it two months and done 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: lots of room, exterior is doing well, although I've not had any problems with the interior yet, the lining seems a bit thin between the boot pockets and interior compartment... I'm worried this may tear or wear through with moderate use, but so far, so good. I've had it two months and done 10 or 12 trips to the slopes with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: silverspurs

customer_reviews.title: Whole family loves them
customer_reviews.text: We love these bags for skiing and now have one for every member of the family. The boys are in charge of carrying their own gear and they know where everything is. My 11 year old got invited to go skiing for the day with a friend the other day and when I picked him up, the parents said he was the lowest-maintenance friend they'd ever taken skiing - he got all his own gear on and was ready to go. In part, I have to credit these bags because they really do help keep the boys stuff together and organized and ready.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: First impressions, I am very excited to use this bag. After 20 years of lugging my boots around my neck and all of my gear in a duffle bag with my helmet popped on my head, I can finally store everything in one bag and actually not look like a first timer. I’ve been too cheap in the past to buy myself a new bag. But I’m so happy I did. Packed it up last night for my first trip of the season and I am so excited. Fits everything I need. Got one for me and one for my boyfriend as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love and worth every penny. This fits all my ski gear, including my ski boots, snow boots (Sorel's), helmet, goggles, ski pants, ski jacket, three pairs of heavy socks, gaiters, gloves, spare gaiters, sunscreen, etc, and there was still room left. I wear a women's 11 boot. My ski boots also dried nicely when I put them away with snow on them, and the grates and vents did their jobs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CWN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BAGS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 3 of these boot bags and they hold a ton of stuff and seem to made of high quality material! My boys and boyfriend are all able to fit their boots, knee pads, helmets, goggles snowpants, cloves masks, tools and even more! So happy to have made these purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Works well/well priced
customer_reviews.text: Actually works well, I was concerned about backpack straps (a bit flimsy) and the connectors (old fashion metal and do not look robust) but works well. I no longer have to carry equipment for 3. It would be nice to have a water proofing between shoe compartment and main but that has not been much of an issue yet. They are priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

product_meta.title: Athalon Everything Boot Bag/Backpack - Ski - Snowboard
product_meta.description: Athalon Everything Boot pack. The most comfortable, organized boot bag made today. Separate side entry boot sections. Reinforced hidden back pack straps. Expanding section for helmet. Waterproof bottom. Top and front carry handles. Front MP3 pocket w/ earphone outlet. The most comfortable, organized, and useful boot bag on the market, the Athalon Everything boot pack offers space for just about all your ski gear save your skis themselves. The bag--which includes four padded lumbar back pads for comfort and support--is outfitted with a large main compartment with separate side-entry zippered boot sections, making it easy to slip your boots inside after a long day on the slopes. You also have plenty of room for other items thanks to the large expandable pocket, which can hold a ski helmet or jacket, and the bungee cords on the front for maps, goggles, and other accessories. Perhaps the most convenient feature for frequent skiers, however, is the pair of hidden, reinforced backpack straps, which make it easy to carry the boot pack to and from the parking lot. Other features include a waterproof tarp along the bottom to keep the bag and its contents from getting wet; a vented boot section with bottom drainage grommets; clips in each pocket for gloves, keys, and other small items; a front MP3 player pocket with an exterior earphone port; top and front carrying handles; matte chrome hardware; and a contoured shape that fits your boots perfectly. Lined with reflective piping to improve visibility on poorly lit days, the boot pack carries Athalon's five-year warranty.
feature_bullets: ADVENTURE TRAVEL READY – pack a jacket, helmet, boots, and all your must have gear in this bag for your next outdoor adventure. The Athalon "Everything" Boot Bag is loaded with features to suit your active lifestyle.
COMFORT FEATURES – this bag include padded hidden backpack straps, four padded lumbar back pads for comfort, and versatile top and front carry handles.
SPECIAL FEATURES – bottom drainage grommets, a waterproof PVC bottom, a bungee cord on the front to hold a jacket or clothing layers, and reflective piping for increased visibility.
DIMENSIONS: 17" x 15" x 14" / Capacity = 3570 cu. in. (58.5 liters) / Weight = 3.8 lbs. / Fits boots up to Size 13 men’s
Constructed of high density polyester with waterproof backing
Separate side entry zippered boot sections. Linear inches: 46 inches
Bottom waterproof tarp to keep bag and contents from getting wet
Contour shape fits boots and provides effortless transportation

AMAZING STORAGE – the boot bag features zippered, ventilated side pockets for boots, a center section for a jacket, helmet, or clothing, an MP3 pocket on the front with headphone port, and clips in each pocket for gloves, keys, and small accessories.
